std_inline.citation:
'''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Aletta van den Berg"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Tulbagh, Baptism register, 1743 to 2 Feb 1800, page 57, entry number 9. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G4 7/1. Transcribed by Lynn Couperthwaite, Trysie Joubert, Richard Ball as part of the eGGSA Project, from VC 657, Cape Archives Repository
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Mother with van wijk anywhere in the surname with Johanna Sophia anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Aletta van den Berg baptism on 14 Mar 1762, daughter of Barend van den Berg & Johanna Sophia van Wijk.

std_narrative.citation:
Aletta, daughter of Barend van den Berg & Johanna Sophia van Wijk, was baptised on 14 March 1762. '''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Aletta van den Berg"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Tulbagh, Baptism register, 1743 to 2 Feb 1800, page 57, entry number 9. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G4 7/1. Transcribed by Lynn Couperthwaite, Trysie Joubert, Richard Ball as part of the eGGSA Project, from VC 657, Cape Archives Repository
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Mother with van wijk anywhere in the surname with Johanna Sophia anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Aletta van den Berg baptism on 14 Mar 1762, daughter of Barend van den Berg & Johanna Sophia van Wijk.
